text: @realDonaldTrump There are 330 million Americans & you can’t lump antibodies tests, that have a 50% accuracy rate, in without actual covid-19 tests. Are you including the 20 million dollars, in covid-19 tests, donated to Las Vegas, by the Saudias, so the strip could open up faster? Just asking 🤷🏻‍♀️
